subject: Re: Thank you for your refinance loan request, we are ready to lend some cash
body:
Your credit report doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this lot will expire TODAY:
$461,000+ debt
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your Credit score will not disqualify you!
http://atilellikgence.com/
